title: TKT-183.4: Present Final Derived Weights to Founder for Approval
description: HARD GATE (Founder Decision #4). Compile all Phase 1 outputs — PQI, CI (season-level), recency decay (Founder-selected rate), conditions similarity (IPL 2023+ baseline), sample confidence — into final composite weights for all 207 tournaments. Present to Founder with tier assignments. NO Phase 2 work can begin until Founder approves.

founder_validation.feedback: Final composite weights approved. 5-factor geometric mean with tiers 1A/1B/1C/2. Phase 1 complete. Ready for Phase 2 integration.
